page.title: 17School Meals
page.content: Each week day 266 meals costing 60p each are cooked in our school kitchen by 3 cooks and 2 kitchen maids who begin work at 7.30a.m. The meals are ready by 11.00 and are taken in heated containers to Wearhead,Rookhope and St John's schools.There are two sittings for dinner in our school, one at 12.00 and the other at 12.30.Two nannys help organise the children while the cooks serve the meal. The menu on 1st May was pork,apple sauce,roast potatoes,parsnips,cabbage and gravy followed by chocolate cake and blancmange. Equipment in the kitchen includes 2 gas cookers,2 boilers,1 steriliser,1 slicing machine ,a fish fryer 1 refrigerator and a potato peeler.Any waste food is taken away by farmer to feed his pigs. The kitchen finishes work at 2.30 p.m.
